bevm-mainnet.name: Beast
bevm-mainnet.description: Beast is the first contract DEX based on Bitcoin L2, providing traders with safe and transparent contract trading, creating a unique decentralized contract trading experience.

bevm-mainnet.name: Bevmswap
bevm-mainnet.description: Bevmswap is the first  BEVM Official's AMM DEX, EVM-Compatible.  Bevmswap focuses on providing the best trading experience and superior liquidity efficiency for BTC ecosystem DeFi users through constant function market makers (CFMM) ,centralized liquidity protocol, and VeToken governance model. Unlike other DEXs, Bevmswap supports liquidity pools made up of yield tokens, allowing contributors to earn double returns from both yield token profits and providing liquidity.

bevm-mainnet.name: Bevscriptions
bevm-mainnet.description: The first inscription platform on BTC L2 - BEVM.

bevm-mainnet.name: Bido
bevm-mainnet.description: Bido is a liquid-staking protocol for BTC on the BEVM network, which is developed based on the lido on the Ethereum.

bevm-mainnet.name: Bitena
bevm-mainnet.description: Bitena, based on Bitcoinâ€™s Layer 2, is a synthetic dollar protocol providing a stablecoin solution independent of traditional banks.

bevm-mainnet.name: BitSmiley
bevm-mainnet.description: bitSmiley is a Bitcoin-native Defi project co-led by OKX Venture and ABCDE. bitSmiley stands as a groundbreaking protocol on the Bitcoin blockchain, driven by the Fintegra framework and comprising three pivotal components.

bevm-mainnet.name: Bool Bridge
bevm-mainnet.description: Bool Network is a Bitcoin Verification Layer that turns all blockchains into Bitcoin's Layer 2.

bevm-mainnet.name: BPEX
bevm-mainnet.description: BPEX, a Bitcoin derivatives protocol, features USD-pegged perpetual futures with BTC as collateral, offering up to 50x leverage. It supports trading in over 1000 assets, including Bitcoin inscriptions, and provides real BTC returns to both liquidity providers and traders while ensuring zero-slippage trading.

bevm-mainnet.name: BridgeM
bevm-mainnet.description: BridgeM is a decentralized interoperability protocol that seamlessly connects Ethereum Layer 2 and Bitcoin Layer 2 networks. It facilitates secure and efficient data communication services.

bevm-mainnet.name: Bunnyfi
bevm-mainnet.description: BunnyFi is a cross-chain interoperability protocol, providing high-performance support for high-frequency bridging.

bevm-mainnet.name: Comet
bevm-mainnet.description: Comet: The First Seamless Interlink Communication Protocol Between All Bitcoin and Ethereum Ecosystems.

bevm-mainnet.name: Coral Finance
bevm-mainnet.description: Coral Finance is a staking protocol on Bitcoin layer2 that allows users to stake non-BTC assets and earn leveraged yield.

bevm-mainnet.name: DIA
bevm-mainnet.description: DIA is a well-known oracle protocol, currently supporting 40+ mainstream L1 and L2 blockchains, continuously providing price feeds for 3000+ tokens and 18000+ NFTs. DIA will connect to BEVM, providing oracle quotation services for BEVM ecosystem projects.

bevm-mainnet.name: Envio
bevm-mainnet.description: Envio is a modern, multi-chain EVM blockchain indexing framework speed-optimized for querying real-time and historical data.

bevm-mainnet.name: Intract
bevm-mainnet.description: Intract is a gamified user-engagement platform with 12M+ verified on-chain users. We facilitate exploration of web3 ecosystems through quests and rewards. Our past campaigns with Binance, MetaMask, and Polygon engaged millions of users, fostering learning about ecosystems, boosting TVL, and encouraging on-chain activities. Our community competes on a gamified leaderboard, incentivizing loyalty and activity.

bevm-mainnet.name: Meson
bevm-mainnet.description: Meson is a leading unified cross-chain bridging protocol that enables the seamless cross-chain experience for tokens like BTC, ETH, BNB, USDC, USDT, and DAI across more than 33 high-performance public chains and layer-2 solutions.

bevm-mainnet.name: OmniBTC
bevm-mainnet.description: The first decentralized omnichain financial platform.

bevm-mainnet.name: OOOO
bevm-mainnet.description: The first modular cross-chain interoperability protocol supporting Bitcoin Ecosystem.

bevm-mainnet.name: Owlto Finance
bevm-mainnet.description: Owlto Finance is a decentralized cross-rollup bridge that focuses on L2, providing 'safe, fast, cheap, and easy-to-use' services.

bevm-mainnet.name: ParticleNetwork
bevm-mainnet.description: ParticleNetwork is currently the world's largest AA wallet, supporting 30+ mainstream chains. ParticleNetwork is currently integrating BEVM, allowing users to experience the convenience of AA smart contract wallets on BTCL2.

bevm-mainnet.name: Polyflow
bevm-mainnet.description: PolyFlow is a decentralized, modular, AI-focused infrastructure for crypto asset operations in PayFi.PID (Web3 Payment ID) is a decentralized identity verification solution constructed using zero-knowledge proofs.

bevm-mainnet.name: Polyhedra
bevm-mainnet.description: Polyhedra is a Web3 cross-operation infrastructure featuring ZKBridge, currently the largest ZKBridge ecosystem, supporting 35+ mainstream L1 and L2 cross-chain interoperability. It also supports both FT and NFT cross-chains at present.

bevm-mainnet.name: Richverse
bevm-mainnet.description: Focus on the BTC ecosystem buildï¼›Starting from Asset Gamification Network,Make the BTC ecosystem more rich and interesting.

bevm-mainnet.name: Satoshi Protocol
bevm-mainnet.description: The Satoshi Protocol is a fully decentralized BTC over-collateralized stablecoin built on BEVM. Any user can mint stablecoins by collateralizing BTC. In the future, the Satoshi Protocol will also integrate its stablecoin into the Lightning Network, allowing its BTC stablecoin to be truly used in the real world.

bevm-mainnet.name: SOEX
bevm-mainnet.description: SOEX is a transaction-driven Web3 instant messaging tool built based on Nostr/Tradivi(Cake)/Sketch protocols.

bevm-mainnet.name: StakeStone
bevm-mainnet.description: A leader in the Omnichain Liquidity Infrastructure Liquidity is the infrastructure. It is the belief of StakeStone.With StakeStone's Liquid Staking solutions, stakers can unlock their staked ETH, accessing liquidity for wider DeFi participation while still earning rewards.

bevm-mainnet.name: Thirdweb
bevm-mainnet.description: Thirdweb is a Web3 development platform that provides pre-built smart contracts to create products, allowing developers to build products quickly and efficiently. Currently, Thirdweb is almost compatible with all mainstream smart contract platforms including BEVM.

bevm-canary.name: Bevscriptions
bevm-canary.description: The first inscription platform on BTC L2 - BEVM.

bevm-canary.name: BitSea
bevm-canary.description: The 1st AMM+NFT platform on #BEVM (BTC Layer2) offers lightning-fast speed and minimal fees Deploy, bridge, and trade your #Bitcoin NFTs and BRC-20 tokens on L2

bevm-canary.name: BL2Rune
bevm-canary.description: BL2Rune is a Rune launch platform built on BEVM , utilizing the virtual machine and decentralized application layer of BEVM to establish new Rune standards.

bevm-canary.name: Coral Finance
bevm-canary.description: Coral Finance is a derivatives trading platform on Bitcoin Layer2. We Premium Trading that provide a reliable and non-inflationary solution for a variety of assets, such as cryptos, inscriptions and stocks of RWA. In addition, it holds core values for users such as asset growth, risk management, and capital efficiency.

bevm-canary.name: Tonka
bevm-canary.description: Tonka is a loan agreement built on BEVM, where users can complete loans by mortgaging BTC and inscribed assets, truly utilizing the inscribed assets and fully releasing their financial value. bevm-canary.name: zk-Name Service
bevm-canary.description: A decentralized community domain name service base on Bitcoin/Ethereum Layer2 network.
